languages.text: "Кровью, потом, слезами и волей служителей Неумирающего мы ткем гобелен равновесия из душ твоих подданных. Вот почему. Тех, кто только ступил на нить Паутины, мы зовем малыми ткачами. Тех, кто давно служит Ему — ткачами. Семь самых верных последователей Его, старшие ткачи, получили семь уникальных рангов: Висирь, он же Первый ткач. Кибелла — Второй ткач. Ио — Третий ткач. Есть еще четверо".

"Through blood, sweat, tears, and the strength of their convictions, the servants of the Undying One spin the souls of your subjects into threads of balance. This is why we refer to ourselves as spinners. Those who are newly committed to the Bloodspun Web are called lesser spinners. If they are faithful in their service to Him, they may eventually become spinners. The most devout of us all are known as the high spinners, of whom there are seven, each bearing a unique title. The Vizsier, the First Spinner, leads the cult. I, Kibellah, am the Second Spinner. The Third Spinner's name is Io, and there are four more."
languages.original_text: "Кровью, потом, слезами и волей служителей Неумирающего мы ткем гобелен равновесия из душ твоих подданных. Вот почему. Тех, кто только ступил на нить Паутины, мы зовем малыми ткачами. Тех, кто давно служит Ему — ткачами. Семь самых верных последователей Его, старшие ткачи, получили семь уникальных рангов: Висирь, он же Первый ткач. Кибелла — Второй ткач. Ио — Третий ткач. Есть еще четверо".

traits.locale_text: "Through blood, sweat, tears, and the will of the Undying One's servants, we weave the tapestry of balance from your subject's souls. That is why. Those who have just begun upon the way of Ahn'shini, we call lesser weavers. Those who have long since served Him are known as weavers. And the seven most devout servants of the Undying One, the high weavers, bear the seven unique ranks. The Vizsier, or the First Weaver. There is the Second Weaver, Kibellah. Io, the Third Weaver. There are four more."

"Through blood, sweat, tears, and the will of the Undying One's servants, we weave the tapestry of balance from your subject's souls. That is why. Those who have just begun upon the way of Ahn'shini, we call lesser weavers. Those who have long since served Him are known as weavers. And the seven most devout servants of the Undying One, the high weavers, bear the seven unique ranks. The Vizsier, or the First Weaver. There is the Second Weaver, Kibellah. Io, the Third Weaver. There are four more."

"Through blood, sweat, tears, and the strength of their convictions, the servants of the Undying One spin the souls of your subjects into threads of balance. This is why we refer to ourselves as spinners. Those who are newly committed to the Bloodspun Web are called lesser spinners. If they are faithful in their service to Him, they may eventually become spinners. The most devout of us all are known as the high spinners, of whom there are but seven, each bearing a unique title. The Vizsier, the First Spinner, leads the cult. I, Kibellah, am the Second Spinner. The Third Spinner's name is Io, and there are four more."

"Through blood, sweat, tears, and the strength of their convictions, the servants of the Undying One weave a tapestry from the souls of your subjects. This is why we refer to ourselves as weavers. Those who are newly committed to the Way of Ahn'shini are called lesser weavers. If they are faithful in their service to Him, they will eventually be promoted to weavers. The most devout servants of the Undying One are known as the high weavers. There are seven in total, and they each have a unique title. The Vizsier, also known as the First Weaver, leads the cult. I am the Second Weaver. The Third Weaver is called Io, and there are four more."

"Through blood, sweat, tears, and the strength of their convictions, the servants of the Undying One spin the souls of your subjects into threads of balance. The Vizsier, the First Spinner, leads the cult. I, Kibellah, am the Second Spinner. The Third Spinner's name is Io, and there are four more."

languages.text: «A base de sangre, sudor, lágrimas y la fuerza de la convicción, los siervos del Inmortal tejemos las almas de sus súbditos en los hilos del equilibrio. Por eso nos referimos a nosotros mismos como tejedores. Los que acaban de comprometerse con la Red Sanguinolenta se denominan tejedores menores. Si Le sirven fielmente, con el tiempo llegan a convertirse en tejedores plenos. A los más devotos de todos se les conoce como sumos tejedores; de ellos hay siete, cada uno con un título único. El Visir, el Primer Tejedor, dirige el culto. Yo, Kibellah, soy la Segunda Tejedora. El nombre de la Tercera Tejedora es Io, y aún hay otros cuatro más».
languages.original_text: "Through blood, sweat, tears, and the strength of their convictions, the servants of the Undying One spin the souls of your subjects into threads of balance. This is why we refer to ourselves as spinners. Those who are newly committed to the Bloodspun Web are called lesser spinners. If they are faithful in their service to Him, they may eventually become spinners. The most devout of us all are known as the high spinners, of whom there are seven, each bearing a unique title. The Vizsier, the First Spinner, leads the cult. I, Kibellah, am the Second Spinner. The Third Spinner's name is Io, and there are four more."

El Visir, el Primer Tejedor, dirige el culto. Yo, Kibellah, soy la Segunda Tejedora. El nombre de la Tercera Tejedora es Io, y aún hay otros cuatro más».

languages.text: 「血と汗と涙、そして信念の強さを通して、不死の者に仕える者たちは臣民の魂を調和の糸へと紡ぎあげる。これが、私たちが自らを織り手と呼ぶ所以よ。ブラッドスパン・ウェブに新たに入信した者は下位織り手と呼ばれる。忠実に主に奉仕すれば、彼らはいずれ織り手になる。最も敬虔な者は、7人の高位織り手と呼ばれて、それぞれに固有の称号があるの。ヴィジールと第一の織り手が教団を率いる。私、キベラは第二の織り手。第三の織り手の名前はイオ。他にも4人いる」
languages.original_text: "Through blood, sweat, tears, and the strength of their convictions, the servants of the Undying One spin the souls of your subjects into threads of balance. This is why we refer to ourselves as spinners. Those who are newly committed to the Bloodspun Web are called lesser spinners. If they are faithful in their service to Him, they may eventually become spinners. The most devout of us all are known as the high spinners, of whom there are seven, each bearing a unique title. The Vizsier, the First Spinner, leads the cult. I, Kibellah, am the Second Spinner. The Third Spinner's name is Io, and there are four more."

「血と汗と涙、そして信念の強さを通して、不死の者に仕える者たちは臣民の魂を調和の糸へと紡ぎあげる。これが、私たちが自らを織り手と呼ぶ所以よ。ブラッドスパン・ウェブに新たに入信した者は下位織り手と呼ばれる。忠実に主に奉仕すれば、彼らはいずれ織り手になる。最も敬虔な者は、7人しかいないものの高位織り手と呼ばれて、それぞれに固有の称号があるの。ヴィジールと第一の織り手が教団を率いる。私、キベラは第二の織り手。第三の織り手の名前はイオ。他にも4人いる」

languages.text: “不死之神的仆人通过鲜血、汗水、眼泪与信念的力量，将所有臣民的灵魂编织成了一张平衡之网。正因如此，我们才会自称‘织网者’。那些刚刚加入织血罗网教派的人被称为低阶织网者，而如果他们勤勤恳恳地侍奉不死之神，他们最终可能会被擢升为中级织网者。我们之中最虔诚的那部分人被称为高阶织网者，高阶织网者共有七位，每一位都有着独一无二的头衔。宿老又被称为首席织网者，负责领导整支教派。我，绮贝菈，是次席织网者。三席织网者的名字叫伊奥。除此之外，还有另外四人。”
languages.original_text: "Through blood, sweat, tears, and the strength of their convictions, the servants of the Undying One spin the souls of your subjects into threads of balance. This is why we refer to ourselves as spinners. Those who are newly committed to the Bloodspun Web are called lesser spinners. If they are faithful in their service to Him, they may eventually become spinners. The most devout of us all are known as the high spinners, of whom there are seven, each bearing a unique title. The Vizsier, the First Spinner, leads the cult. I, Kibellah, am the Second Spinner. The Third Spinner's name is Io, and there are four more."

“不死之神的仆人通过鲜血、汗水、眼泪与信念的力量，将所有臣民的灵魂编织成了一张平衡之网。正因如此，我们才会自称‘织网者’。那些刚刚加入织血罗网教派的人被称为低阶织网者，而如果他们勤勤恳恳地侍奉不死之神，他们最终可能会被擢升为中级织网者。我们之中最虔诚的那部分人被称为高阶织网者，高阶织网者只能有七位，每一位都有着独一无二的头衔。宿老又被称为首席织网者，负责领导整支教派。我，绮贝菈，是次席织网者。三席织网者的名字叫伊奥。除此之外，还有另外四人。”

languages.text: "Durch Blut, Schweiß, Tränen und die Stärke ihrer Überzeugungen spinnen die Diener des Todlosen aus den Seelen Eurer Untertanen Fäden des Gleichgewichts. Deshalb bezeichnen wir uns selbst als Spinner. Wer sich dem Blutgesponnenen Netzt erst kürzlich verschrieben hat, ist ein niederer Spinner. Nach treuen Diensten für Ihn wird er irgendwann zum Spinner. Die Ergebensten von uns allen sind hohe Spinner, von denen es sieben gibt, jeweils mit einem einzigartigen Titel. Der Wesir, der Erste Spinner, leitet den Kult. Ich, Kibellah, bin die Zweite Spinnerin. Der Dritte Spinner heißt Io, und daneben gibt es noch vier weitere.
languages.original_text: "Through blood, sweat, tears, and the strength of their convictions, the servants of the Undying One spin the souls of your subjects into threads of balance. This is why we refer to ourselves as spinners. Those who are newly committed to the Bloodspun Web are called lesser spinners. If they are faithful in their service to Him, they may eventually become spinners. The most devout of us all are known as the high spinners, of whom there are seven, each bearing a unique title. The Vizsier, the First Spinner, leads the cult. I, Kibellah, am the Second Spinner. The Third Spinner's name is Io, and there are four more."

languages.text: « Par le sang, la sueur, les larmes et la force de leurs convictions, les serviteurs de l'Immortel transforment les âmes de vos sujets en fils d'équilibre. C'est la raison pour laquelle nous nous faisons appeler tisseurs. Ceux qui viennent tout juste d'adopter les Préceptes de la Toile de Sang sont nommés tisseurs inférieurs. S'ils Le servent fidèlement, ils sont appelés à devenir des tisseurs à part entière. Les plus dévots d'entre nous, les hauts tisseurs, sont sept en tout et pour tout, chacun portant un titre qui lui est propre. Le vizir et premier tisseur est à la tête de notre culte. Moi, Kibellah, je suis la deuxième tisseuse. Le troisième tisseur s'appelle Io, et il y en a quatre autres. »
languages.original_text: "Through blood, sweat, tears, and the strength of their convictions, the servants of the Undying One spin the souls of your subjects into threads of balance. This is why we refer to ourselves as spinners. Those who are newly committed to the Bloodspun Web are called lesser spinners. If they are faithful in their service to Him, they may eventually become spinners. The most devout of us all are known as the high spinners, of whom there are seven, each bearing a unique title. The Vizsier, the First Spinner, leads the cult. I, Kibellah, am the Second Spinner. The Third Spinner's name is Io, and there are four more."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen'in hizmetkârları; kanlarıyla, terleriyle, gözyaşlarıyla ve de inançlarının verdiği kuvvetle kullarının ruhlarını iplik gibi dokuyup dengeyi sağlar. İşte bu yüzden kendimize dokur deriz. Kanipi Ağı'na yeni katılanlara küçük dokur denir. O'na vefayla hizmet edenler, nihayetinde dokur olmayı hak eder. Aramızdan en dini bütünlere yüksek dokur denir. Yedi yüksek dokur vardır ve hepsinin de de eşsiz bir ünvanı olur. Vezir denen İlk Dokur, tarikatın başıdır. Ben, yani Kibellah ise İkinci Dokur oluyorum. Üçüncü Dokur'un adı İo'dur. Dört tanemiz daha vardır."
languages.original_text: "Through blood, sweat, tears, and the strength of their convictions, the servants of the Undying One spin the souls of your subjects into threads of balance. This is why we refer to ourselves as spinners. Those who are newly committed to the Bloodspun Web are called lesser spinners. If they are faithful in their service to Him, they may eventually become spinners. The most devout of us all are known as the high spinners, of whom there are seven, each bearing a unique title. The Vizsier, the First Spinner, leads the cult. I, Kibellah, am the Second Spinner. The Third Spinner's name is Io, and there are four more."
